title: Wind Cave National Park: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours        NPS      Tour Information  All cave tours are ranger-guided and leave from the visitor center. Tickets are sold on a first-come, first-served basis. Reservations are available for the Candlelight and Wild Cave tours, as well as for groups. Long waits are common during peak summer visitation. To avoid waits, tour the cave during the early hours of the day or on weekends. Tuesdays and Wednesdays are the busiest days. To ensure a safe visit, please review the Cave Tour Safety Information page.  NOTE: Tour schedules are subject to change. Please call 605.745.4600 to confirm tour times.      Tour Descriptions Follow the links below for in-depth descriptions about each tour.   Regular Walking Tours   Garden of Eden Tour - Easy:  Ideal for those with limited time or abilities. Natural Entrance Tour - Moderate:  The most popular tour and great for families. Fairgrounds Tour - Strenuous:  Widest array of features and most stairs of any tour.  Specialty Tours    Candlelight Tour - Strenuous:  Includes some off-trail travel. Minimum age is 8 years old. Wild Cave Tour - Very Strenuous:  Crawling required. Minimum age is 16 (with signed parent permission).        Tour & Program Schedule Early 2016 - April 15, 2016 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 4:30 pm     Cave Tour   Garden of Eden or Natural Entrance - 10:00, 1:00, and 3:00 daily except January 1      April 16 - April 30, 2016 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 5:00 pm     Cave Tour   Garden of Eden or Natural Entrance - 9:30, 11:30, 1:30, and 3:30      May 1 - May 27, 2016 (subject to change)       Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 5:00 pm     Cave Tour   Natural Entrance - 9:00, 10:30, 11:30, 1:30, 2:30, and 4:00       May 28 - May 30, 2016 Memorial Day Weekend (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 6:00 pm     Cave Tours   Natural Entrance - 8:40, 9:20, 10:30, 11:30, 12:30, 1:30, 2:30, 3:30, 4:30, and 5:00 Garden of Eden - 10:00, 12:00, and 2:00 Fairgrounds - 11:00, 1:00, and 3:00      May 31 - June 4, 2016 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 6:00 pm     Cave Tours   Natural Entrance - 9:00, 10:00, 11:00, 12:00, 1:00, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, and 5:00 Garden of Eden - 1:30 and 3:30       June 5 - August 20, 2016 Reduced tours August 7-13. See below. (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 7:00 pm     Cave Tours   Natural Entrance - 8:40, 9:20, 10:00, 11:00, 12:00, 1:00, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 5:00, 5:30 and 6:00 Garden of Eden - 10:40, 12:40, and 2:40 Fairgrounds - 9:40, 10:20, 11:40, 12:20, 1:40, 2:20, 3:40, and 4:20     Specialty Tours   Candlelight Tours - 10:30 am, 1:30 pm (Reservations strongly recommended) Wild Cave Tours - 1:00 pm (Reservations required) NOTE: Reservations are accepted beginning one month before the tour and must be made in person or by phone at 605-745-4600.     Campfire Programs   Nightly at the Elk Mountain Campground amphitheater at 9:00 pm. Tuesdays and Thursdays in July be prepared for a prairie night hike. These hikes meet at the amphitheater for a short program and then car caravan to explore the prairie at night.      August 21 - September 5, 2016 & August 7-13 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 6:00 pm     Cave Tours   Natural Entrance - 9:00, 10:00, 11:00, 12:00, 1:00, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, and 5:00 Garden of Eden - 10:30, 1:40, and 3:40 Fairgrounds - 9:30, 11:20, 1:20, and 3:20     Specialty Tours   Candlelight Tours - 1:30 pm daily (Reservations strongly recommended) Wild Cave Tours - 1:00 pm weekends only (Reservations required) NOTE: Reservations are accepted beginning one month before the tour and must be made in person or by phone at 605-745-4600.     Campfire Programs   Nightly at the Elk Mountain Campground amphitheater. Call 605.745.4600 for times.      September 6 - September 24, 2016 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 5:00 pm     Cave Tour   Natural Entrance - 9:00, 10:30, 11:30, 1:30, 2:30, and 4:30     Autumn Evening Activity   Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays at the Elk Mountain Campground at 7:00 pm starting early September       September 25 - October 8, 2016 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 5:00 pm     Cave Tour   Garden of Eden or Natural Entrance - 9:30, 11:30, 1:30, and 3:30     Autumn Evening Activity   Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays at the Elk Mountain Campground at 7:00 pm through the end of September       October 9 - Early 2017 (subject to change)     Visitor Center   Open daily 8:00 am - 4:30 pm     Cave Tour   Garden of Eden or Natural Entrance - 10:00, 1:00, and 3:00 daily except Thanksgiving Day, December 25, and January 1
